bio:
Frothar is a Nord child and the eldest son of Balgruuf the Greater, and as such is in line to eventually succeed his father as the Jarl of Whiterun.
He can be usually be found walking around Dragonsreach, the jarl's palace in Whiterun. Frothar has a half-brother named Nelkir and a sister named Dagny.
Unlike his siblings, he doesn't make any condescending comments towards visitors to the palace.
name: Frothar
